channel.title: Papers on Ameer Helmi
channel.description: Recent content in Papers on Ameer Helmi

item.title: Pilot Observations of an Autonomous Red Light, Green Light Robot for Interactions with Children with Disabilities
item.description: Describes the design and initial testing of the red light, green light mode for GoBot.

item.title: Harnessing the Power of Movement: A Body-Weight Support System & Assistive Robot Case Study
item.description: Describes the case study conducted with GoBot, Shelbytron, and the Body-Weight-Support-Harness.

item.title: Let Them Have Bubbles! Filling Gaps in Toy-Like Behaviors for Child-Robot Interaction
item.description: Describes a review of Fisher-Price toys for developmental capabilities and an analysis of an initial child-robot interaction study.
